markdownRemark.html: TIL about Kling, a new AI video model from China's Kuaishou Technology that can make amazing videos from just text! It's like OpenAI's Sora, but maybe even better. Kling can create 2-minute videos in high quality (1080p and 30 fps) and uses cool 3D technology to make realistic faces and movements. It's impressive how it can understand complex scenes and follow physics rules. While OpenAI's Sora is not out yet, Kling is already available for some users in China through an app called Kwaiying. It's exciting to see how AI is changing the way we make videos, and I wonder how this will affect things like advertising in the future.
